officialTitle: Mastectomy and Breast Cancer : Follow-up of IBR's Rate and Study of Complications as Compared to Delayed Reconstructions Between 2016 and 2020 in Lyon
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Over 18 years
* Breast cancer
* Mastectomy
* Hopital de la Croix-Rousse
* January 2016 and January 2020

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prophylactic mastectomy
* Male gender
